Sentencas: Sonochemical processing was used to synthesize highly sinterable nanocrystalline cerium oxide-based materials (i.e., Gd2O3-doped and Sm2O3-doped CeO2 electrolytes).
Titulo: Sonochemical synthesis of highly sinterable/nanocrystalline CeO2-based electrolyte powders for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The crystallinity and grain size was investigated using X-ray diffraction and transmission electron microscopy, confirming that the nanocrystals were approximately 5 nm to 7 nm in size.
Titulo: Sonochemical synthesis of highly sinterable/nanocrystalline CeO2-based electrolyte powders for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The feature of nanocrystalline particles resulted in a 200 degrees C lower sintering temperature than the conventional 1,550 degrees C sintering temperature used for commercial microcrystalline CeO2-based materials.
Titulo: Sonochemical synthesis of highly sinterable/nanocrystalline CeO2-based electrolyte powders for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This significant improvement in sintering temperature was confirmed by microstructural and sintering characterization.
Titulo: Sonochemical synthesis of highly sinterable/nanocrystalline CeO2-based electrolyte powders for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
